title: Custom Tool Schema
description: Schema for validating custom tool definitions

exports.description: List of module exports (functions or objects) the tool exposes to the platform

name.description: Export name exposed to the runtime/CLI

object.description: Name of the object or function in the implementation module

platform.description:
Platform-specific configuration (e.g. opencode).
Allows configuring mappings between tool parameters and platform/context variables.

contextMapping.description:
Map of Opencode context variable names to tool parameter names.
Keys must be one of the known Opencode context variables: `agent`, `sessionID`, `messageID`, `directory`, `worktree`. Values are the corresponding tool parameter names (strings).

agent.description: Tool parameter name to bind to the opencode agent context variable

sessionID.description: Tool parameter name to bind to the opencode sessionID context variable

messageID.description: Tool parameter name to bind to the opencode messageID context variable

directory.description: Tool parameter name to bind to the opencode directory context variable

worktree.description: Tool parameter name to bind to the opencode worktree context variable

additionalProperties.description:
Other platform-specific configuration objects.
Each platform object may include a `contextMapping` object with string values mapping parameter names to context variables.
